name: places/ChIJqWFbwwf0wokRQhv90E1LLjM
formattedAddress: 101 Sherman Ave # 4, New York, NY 10034, USA
adrFormatAddress: 101 Sherman Ave # 4, New York, NY 10034-5626, USA

originalText.text:
The biggest problem here is that they are non responsive.  They almost never answer their phone, they have one superintendent who rarely picks up his phone and his voicemail is full.  If you want ANY work to be done you better not work a 9-5 job because those are the hours that they work and nothing more.  Not even 4 or 5 Saturday hours. But what really gets me is just how mediocre they are.  I've been here about 5 years, they've never done anything for the residents, even something small.  No one ever shows their faces, no sort of appreciation.

If you are stuck between this place and another place and you have to choose.  Choose the other place.

They get two stars because it's not a trash fire, just mediocre in every department.  Also it would be really great if they did apartment inspections to make sure everything is safe and up to code.

originalText.text: i just put three stars bc it doesnt really make sense to give a place where you hand in your rent a 5 star review

originalText.text: The secretary/woman employed at the office has one of the nastiest attitudes I've ever witnessed, and I'm not the only person who agrees with this sentiment from what I've heard from my neighbors.
